description: An amazing new app from a 15 year old app developer! We all have those friends, who ask too many questions. Ever wish you could redirect those questions to a search engine? Now you can. Let Me Google That For You is an easy to use, lightweight tool, which lets you quickly create links that show an animation of someone searching for whatever search term you choose in a search engine, and then it redirects them to google. This is a great app for anyone with annoying friends, who ask way too many questions. Free, and Ad Free for a limited time! If you have a support question, or comment, please feel free to email or text me. I can not respond to your comments! Now includes Bit.ly url shortening support!
